examples: At what age are children able to distinguish between right and wrong?
¿A qué edad pueden los niños distinguir entre el bien y el mal?
English law clearly distinguishes between murder and manslaughter.
La ley inglesa distingue claramente entre asesinato y homicidio.
It was hard to distinguish one twin from the other.
Era difícil distinguir a un gemelo del otro.
Sometimes reality and fantasy are hard to distinguish.
A veces, la realidad y la fantasía son difíciles de distinguir.
